name: vscode-slack-bot
description: Bridge between Slack and VS Code Chat (Copilot) — incoming Slack threads become chat sessions, replies flow both ways.

chatParticipants.name: slack
chatParticipants.description: Bridge to Slack threads — incoming messages are routed here, replies post back to Slack.

vscode-slack-bot.autoStart.description: Automatically start the Slack bot when VS Code opens (requires tokens to be configured).

vscode-slack-bot.systemPrompt.default: You are a helpful coding assistant. Answer concisely and accurately.
vscode-slack-bot.systemPrompt.markdownDescription: System prompt sent to the language model for all Slack-originated conversations. Leave empty to use no system prompt.

vscode-slack-bot.maxHistoryMessages.description: Maximum number of conversation history messages to keep per Slack thread.
